body: Amnesty International has condemned the convictionof eight South Koreans who are members of the Socialist Workers League. All eight men were found guilty under the National Security Law for "propagating or instigating a rebellion against the State'. Amnesty International criticized the law has been used to justify a form of censorship.
original_body: Amnesty International has condemned the convictionof eight South Koreans who are members of the Socialist Workers League. All eight men were found guilty under the National Security Law for "propagating or instigating a rebellion against the State'. Amnesty International criticized the law has been used to justify a form of censorship.
title: South Korea: Amnesty International Condemns Korean Government's Censorship.
